00062 /* Render Engine Types */
00063 
00064 static RenderEngineType internal_render_type = {
00065     NULL, NULL,
00066     "BLENDER_RENDER", N_("Blender Render"), RE_INTERNAL,
00067     NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL,
00068     {NULL, NULL, NULL}};
00069 
00070 #ifdef WITH_GAMEENGINE
00071 
00072 static RenderEngineType internal_game_type = {
00073     NULL, NULL,
00074     "BLENDER_GAME", N_("Blender Game"), RE_INTERNAL|RE_GAME,
00075     NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL,
00076     {NULL, NULL, NULL}};
00077 
00078 #endif
00079 
00080 ListBase R_engines = {NULL, NULL};
00081 
00082 void RE_engines_init(void)
00083 {
00084     BLI_addtail(&R_engines, &internal_render_type);
00085 #ifdef WITH_GAMEENGINE
00086     BLI_addtail(&R_engines, &internal_game_type);
00087 #endif
00088 }
00089 
00090 void RE_engines_exit(void)
00091 {
00092     RenderEngineType *type, *next;
00093 
00094     for (type=R_engines.first; type; type=next) {
00095         next= type->next;
00096 
00097         BLI_remlink(&R_engines, type);
00098 
00099         if (!(type->flag & RE_INTERNAL)) {
00100             if (type->ext.free)
00101                 type->ext.free(type->ext.data);
00102 
00103             MEM_freeN(type);
00104         }
00105     }
00106 }
00107 
00108 RenderEngineType *RE_engines_find(const char *idname)
00109 {
00110     RenderEngineType *type;
00111     
00112     type= BLI_findstring(&R_engines, idname, offsetof(RenderEngineType, idname));
00113     if (!type)
00114         type= &internal_render_type;
00115 
00116     return type;
00117 }
00118 
00119 int RE_engine_is_external(Render *re)
00120 {
00121     RenderEngineType *type= RE_engines_find(re->r.engine);
00122     return (type && type->render);
00123 }

00125 /* Create, Free */
00126 
00127 RenderEngine *RE_engine_create(RenderEngineType *type)
00128 {
00129     RenderEngine *engine = MEM_callocN(sizeof(RenderEngine), "RenderEngine");
00130     engine->type= type;
00131 
00132     return engine;
00133 }
00134 
00135 void RE_engine_free(RenderEngine *engine)
00136 {
00137 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00138     if (engine->py_instance) {
00139         BPY_DECREF(engine->py_instance);
00140     }
00141 #endif
00142 
00143     if (engine->text)
00144         MEM_freeN(engine->text);
00145 
00146     MEM_freeN(engine);
00147 }
00148 
00149 /* Render Results */
00150 
00151 RenderResult *RE_engine_begin_result(RenderEngine *engine, int x, int y, int w, int h)
00152 {
00153     Render *re= engine->re;
00154     RenderResult *result;
00155     rcti disprect;
00156 
00157     /* ensure the coordinates are within the right limits */
00158     CLAMP(x, 0, re->result->rectx);
00159     CLAMP(y, 0, re->result->recty);
00160     CLAMP(w, 0, re->result->rectx);
00161     CLAMP(h, 0, re->result->recty);
00162 
00163     if (x + w > re->result->rectx)
00164         w= re->result->rectx - x;
00165     if (y + h > re->result->recty)
00166         h= re->result->recty - y;
00167 
00168     /* allocate a render result */
00169     disprect.xmin = x;
00170     disprect.xmax = x+w;
00171     disprect.ymin = y;
00172     disprect.ymax = y+h;
00173 
00174     result= render_result_new(re, &disprect, 0, RR_USE_MEM);
00175     BLI_addtail(&engine->fullresult, result);
00176     
00177     result->tilerect.xmin += re->disprect.xmin;
00178     result->tilerect.xmax += re->disprect.xmin;
00179     result->tilerect.ymin += re->disprect.ymin;
00180     result->tilerect.ymax += re->disprect.ymin;
00181 
00182     return result;
00183 }
00184 
00185 void RE_engine_update_result(RenderEngine *engine, RenderResult *result)
00186 {
00187     Render *re= engine->re;
00188 
00189     if (result) {
00190         result->renlay= result->layers.first; // weak, draws first layer always
00191         re->display_draw(re->ddh, result, NULL);
00192     }
00193 }
00194 
00195 void RE_engine_end_result(RenderEngine *engine, RenderResult *result)
00196 {
00197     Render *re= engine->re;
00198 
00199     if (!result)
00200         return;
00201 
00202     /* merge. on break, don't merge in result for preview renders, looks nicer */
00203     if (!(re->test_break(re->tbh) && (re->r.scemode & R_PREVIEWBUTS)))
00204         render_result_merge(re->result, result);
00205 
00206     /* draw */
00207     if (!re->test_break(re->tbh)) {
00208         result->renlay= result->layers.first; // weak, draws first layer always
00209         re->display_draw(re->ddh, result, NULL);
00210     }
00211 
00212     /* free */
00213     render_result_free_list(&engine->fullresult, result);
00214 }
00215 
00216 /* Cancel */
00217 
00218 int RE_engine_test_break(RenderEngine *engine)
00219 {
00220     Render *re= engine->re;
00221 
00222     if (re)
00223         return re->test_break(re->tbh);
00224     
00225     return 0;
00226 }

00228 /* Statistics */
00229 
00230 void RE_engine_update_stats(RenderEngine *engine, const char *stats, const char *info)
00231 {
00232     Render *re= engine->re;
00233 
00234     /* stats draw callback */
00235     if (re) {
00236         re->i.statstr= stats;
00237         re->i.infostr= info;
00238         re->stats_draw(re->sdh, &re->i);
00239         re->i.infostr= NULL;
00240         re->i.statstr= NULL;
00241     }
00242 
00243     /* set engine text */
00244     if (engine->text) {
00245         MEM_freeN(engine->text);
00246         engine->text= NULL;
00247     }
00248 
00249     if (stats && stats[0] && info && info[0])
00250         engine->text= BLI_sprintfN("%s | %s", stats, info);
00251     else if (info && info[0])
00252         engine->text= BLI_strdup(info);
00253     else if (stats && stats[0])
00254         engine->text= BLI_strdup(stats);
00255 }
00256 
00257 void RE_engine_update_progress(RenderEngine *engine, float progress)
00258 {
00259     Render *re= engine->re;
00260 
00261     if (re) {
00262         CLAMP(progress, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00263         re->progress(re->prh, progress);
00264     }
00265 }
00266 
00267 void RE_engine_report(RenderEngine *engine, int type, const char *msg)
00268 {
00269     BKE_report(engine->re->reports, type, msg);
00270 }
00271 
00272 /* Render */
00273 
00274 int RE_engine_render(Render *re, int do_all)
00275 {
00276     RenderEngineType *type= RE_engines_find(re->r.engine);
00277     RenderEngine *engine;
00278 
00279     /* verify if we can render */
00280     if (!type->render)
00281         return 0;
00282     if ((re->r.scemode & R_PREVIEWBUTS) && !(type->flag & RE_USE_PREVIEW))
00283         return 0;
00284     if (do_all && !(type->flag & RE_USE_POSTPROCESS))
00285         return 0;
00286     if (!do_all && (type->flag & RE_USE_POSTPROCESS))
00287         return 0;
00288 
00289     /* create render result */
00290     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
00291     if (re->result==NULL || !(re->r.scemode & R_PREVIEWBUTS)) {
00292         if (re->result)
00293             render_result_free(re->result);
00294         re->result= render_result_new(re, &re->disprect, 0, 0);
00295     }
00296     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
00297     
00298     if (re->result==NULL)
00299         return 1;
00300 
00301     /* set render info */
00302     re->i.cfra= re->scene->r.cfra;
00303     BLI_strncpy(re->i.scenename, re->scene->id.name+2, sizeof(re->i.scenename));
00304     re->i.totface=re->i.totvert=re->i.totstrand=re->i.totlamp=re->i.tothalo= 0;
00305 
00306     /* render */
00307     engine = RE_engine_create(type);
00308     engine->re= re;
00309 
00310     if (re->flag & R_ANIMATION)
00311         engine->flag |= RE_ENGINE_ANIMATION;
00312     if (re->r.scemode & R_PREVIEWBUTS)
00313         engine->flag |= RE_ENGINE_PREVIEW;
00314     engine->camera_override = re->camera_override;
00315 
00316     if ((re->r.scemode & (R_NO_FRAME_UPDATE|R_PREVIEWBUTS))==0)
00317         scene_update_for_newframe(re->main, re->scene, re->lay);
00318 
00319     if (type->update)
00320         type->update(engine, re->main, re->scene);
00321     if (type->render)
00322         type->render(engine, re->scene);
00323 
00324     render_result_free_list(&engine->fullresult, engine->fullresult.first);
00325 
00326     RE_engine_free(engine);
00327 
00328     if (BKE_reports_contain(re->reports, RPT_ERROR))
00329         G.afbreek = 1;
00330     
00331     return 1;
00332 }
